channel.title: AfterLife PK BETA TESTING (OleanPkz Revamp) - Coders Needed! - Staff Needed!
channel.description:
[center]
[size=20pt]CODERS (Development Team) needed!
Server Staff (Management Team) needed![/size]
[IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/72ysmt.png[/img] [url=http://rsbc.smfforfree3.com]Terms and Agreements[/url] - [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/vzbfr6.png[/img] [url=http://rsbc.smfforfree3.com]Site[/url] - [img]http://i44.tinypic.com/9j41t1.jpg[/img] [url=http://rsbc.smfforfree3.com]Forum[/url] - [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/15npw1v.gif[/img] [url=http://www.rsbc.smfforfree3.com]Download Client[/url] [/center]
[center][size=13pt]We are back!
The current forum set in place was for OleanPkz back in 2011. I have updated the client download link on the [url=http://rsbc.smfforfree3.com/index.php]forum[/url]. You need to [url=http://rsbc.smfforfree3.com/index.php]download[/url] the client to play.
[b]The server is in BETA testing. [/b]
There are dupes, and exploits[b] I am[/b] aware. Feel free to have at it. They will all be patched when the BETA period ends.
During this process I will be looking for staff. I will be working on this server for about 1-2 more months before it is ready to go paid advertisement. It is currently hosted on a VPS but will be poorly advertised. No voting or donation system is in place during this period.
Feel free to log on and check us out.
The pictures below are old, but still contain a lot of the material used in the server.
Only half of our minigames and bosses are accessible to non-management personnel at this time. Later in time all will be available to the public.
Accessable minigames and bosses incude: Barrows Hills Complete Jad Waves recoded by myself to offer a better experience. Fight Pits PKing & FunPK Kalphite Queen General Graador Giant Mole Duel Arena Castle Wars, 5+ CUSTOM minigames coded by myself, and tons more!
I'm trying to make it so a player always has something to do when logging in. Weather it be train all you non-combat skills, or play minigames, or merch, or make items and sell them- there is literally SO much to offer in this server. Please keep in mind, again, we are in BETA and there are bugs and NO ECONOMY present.
[center]
[color=black] [b]Introduction:[/b] [color=black][url=http://www.rsbc.smfforfree3.com]AfterLife PK[/url] 2009-2015 Owned and created by Jason
[color=black] We offer over 15 trainable skills and have over 10 bosses, and 7 minigames! Suggestions are [u]always[/u] welcome and are read daily by the OleanPkz Management Team.
[center][size=18pt][color=blue]Pictures/Media:[/size] [size=11pt][u]From the beginning..[/u][/size] [/center] [IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/10ymn0w.png[/img] [i]Upon login if completed short (2-5 minute) starter training you will receive massive amounts of points, donator rank, and the ability to use the ::bank command.[/i]
[IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/1z35elg.png[/img] [color=black][i]If you wish to skip the tutorial you can type ::skiptutorial[/i][/color]
[IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/w0i73m.png[/img] [color=black][i]If you do not skip the tutorial you can pick one of these starters.[/i][/color]
[IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/24q4sqb.jpg[/img] [color=black][i]The home area.[/i][/color]
[IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/24dg3dy.png[/img] [color=black][i]Just about every area has it's own map. You can type ::map in a certain area to access it's map. Only super donators can access all maps at any time without being in that area.[/i][/color]
[IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/wsr6sj.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/2urxtkx.png[/img] [color=black][i]Account Panel.[/i][/color]
[IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/2mnitg2.png[/img] [color=black][i]Regular Player Panel[/i][/color]
[IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/334j1ua.png[/img] [color=black][i]Donator Panel[/i][/color]
[IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/w1utl3.png[/img] [color=black][i]Super Donator Panel[/i][/color]
More to come..

item.title: AfterLife PK BETA TESTING (OleanPkz Revamp) - Coders Needed! - Staff Needed!
item.dc:creator: @JGX JGX
item.description:
@JGX wrote:

[center]

[size=20pt]CODERS (Development Team) needed!

Server Staff (Management Team) needed![/size]

Terms and Agreements - Site - Forum - Download Client
[/center]

[center][size=13pt]We are back!

The current forum set in place was for OleanPkz back in 2011.
I have updated the client download link on the forum.
You need to download the client to play.

The server is in BETA testing.

There are dupes, and exploits I am aware.
Feel free to have at it.
They will all be patched when the BETA period ends.

During this process I will be looking for staff.
I will be working on this server for about 1-2 more months before it is ready to go paid advertisement.
It is currently hosted on a VPS but will be poorly advertised.
No voting or donation system is in place during this period.

Feel free to log on and check us out.

The pictures below are old, but still contain a lot of the material used in the server.

Only half of our minigames and bosses are accessible to non-management personnel at this time.
Later in time all will be available to the public.

Accessable minigames and bosses incude:
Barrows Hills
Complete Jad Waves recoded by myself to offer a better experience.
Fight Pits
PKing & FunPK
Kalphite Queen
General Graador
Giant Mole
Duel Arena
Castle Wars,
5+ CUSTOM minigames coded by myself,
and tons more!

Iâ€™m trying to make it so a player always has something to do when logging in. Weather it be train all you non-combat skills, or play minigames, or merch, or make items and sell them- there is literally SO much to offer in this server. Please keep in mind, again, we are in BETA and there are bugs and NO ECONOMY present.

[center]

[color=black]
Introduction:
[color=black]AfterLife PK 2009-2015
Owned and created by Jason

[color=black]
We offer over 15 trainable skills and have over 10 bosses, and 7 minigames!
Suggestions are always welcome and are read daily by the OleanPkz Management Team.

[center][size=18pt][color=blue]Pictures/Media:[/size]
[size=11pt]From the beginningâ€¦[/size]
[/center]

Upon login if completed short (2-5 minute) starter training you will receive massive amounts of points, donator rank, and the ability to use the ::bank command.


[color=black]If you wish to skip the tutorial you can type ::skiptutorial[/color]


[color=black]If you do not skip the tutorial you can pick one of these starters.[/color]


[color=black]The home area.[/color]


[color=black]Just about every area has itâ€™s own map. You can type ::map in a certain area to access itâ€™s map. Only super donators can access all maps at any time without being in that area.[/color]


[color=black]Account Panel.[/color]


[color=black]Regular Player Panel[/color]


[color=black]Donator Panel[/color]


[color=black]Super Donator Panel[/color]

More to comeâ€¦
